title: Cubix
resume: Cubix is a South Korean animated television series created by Cinepix. 4Kids Entertainment acquired the rights for an English adaption dub to the series in 2001, retaining them until their transfer to Saban Brands in June 2012. Saban Brands currently owns and manages the copyright and branding of the English adaption of the series.

Saban Brands currently owns and manages the copyright and branding of the English adaption of the series.
